contact_page.faq_heading: FAQs - Do you have any questions for us?
contact_page.faq_desc: If there are question you want to ask. We will answer all your question.
contact_page.question_1: What makes Kindle Hope Candles different from other shops?
contact_page.answer_1: Kindle Hope Candles stands out from other shops not only because we offer high-quality scented candles, but also because we are committed to giving back to the community. For every candle sold, we allocate a portion of our revenue to charitable activities, specifically aimed at helping children in remote and disadvantaged areas. Through this initiative, we strive to spread love and hope, making every purchase not just a product, but a meaningful contribution to society.
contact_page.question_2: How secure is my payment on Kindle Hope Candles?
contact_page.answer_2: At Kindle Hope Candles, your payment security is our top priority. We offer multiple secure payment methods, allowing you to complete your purchase with ease. Customers can pay through all major banks in Vietnam as well as popular e-wallets like Momo, VnPay, and ZaloPay. Our platform is equipped with advanced encryption technology to ensure that your personal and payment information remains safe and protected at all times.
contact_page.question_3: Can I personalize my Kindle Hope Candles experience?
contact_page.answer_3: Yes, at Kindle Hope Candles, we strive to make your experience as personalized as possible. You can choose from a variety of scents, and we also offer the option to create custom scent combinations that suit your preferences. Additionally, you can personalize your candles with custom labels for special occasions, making them perfect for gifts or personal use. We are committed to giving you a unique and meaningful experience with every candle purchase.
contact_page.question_4: Can I track the impact of my purchase with Kindle Hope Candles' charity efforts?
contact_page.answer_4: Absolutely! At Kindle Hope Candles, transparency is important to us. We provide regular updates on our charitable initiatives, so you can see exactly how your purchase is making a difference. Whether it’s supporting children in remote areas or funding educational projects, you’ll be able to track the positive impact through our website and social media channels. Your candle not only brightens your home but also brings hope to those in need.

delivery_policy_page.heading: Delivery policy
delivery_policy_page.sapo: Thank you for choosing Kindle Hope Candles. We are committed to providing the best shopping experience with a fast and convenient delivery policy. Below are the details of our delivery policy:
delivery_policy_page.p_1_content: Kindle Hope Candles currently supports delivery within Ho Chi Minh City and across Vietnam. We do not offer international shipping at this time.
delivery_policy_page.p_2_content:
• For customers in Ho Chi Minh City, the estimated delivery time is 1-3 working days from the time the order is confirmed.
  • For customers in other provinces, delivery may take 3-7 working days, depending on the location and shipping method.
  • During holidays, festivals, or bad weather conditions, the delivery time may be extended. We will notify you in case of any delays.
delivery_policy_page.p_3_content:
• Free shipping for orders over 500,000 VND within Ho Chi Minh City.
  • For orders under 500,000 VND, the shipping fee will be calculated based on the rates of our shipping partners and will be communicated at the time of order placement.
delivery_policy_page.p_4_content:
• We partner with reputable shipping companies to ensure your products are delivered in the best condition.
  • Customers can choose between standard delivery and express delivery during the checkout process.
delivery_policy_page.p_5_content:
• Customers have the right to check the condition of the product before making payment. If any damage or discrepancies are found, you can refuse to accept the order.
  • After receiving the order, if there are any issues related to the product (damage, missing items, manufacturing defects, etc.), please contact us within 48 hours for assistance.
delivery_policy_page.p_6_content: • For more information about your order status or any questions regarding the delivery process, please contact us via our hotline at 0962334807 or email us at support@kindlehopecandles.vn.
delivery_policy_page.p_7: We hope Kindle Hope Candles brings you the best products and services. Thank you for your trust and support!

privacy_policy_page.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy_page.sapo: At Kindle Hope Candles, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This privacy policy clearly explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website. By accessing and using the Kindle Hope Candles website, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.
privacy_policy_page.p_1_sapo: We collect two types of information from you:
privacy_policy_page.p_1_content_1: When you make a purchase or register an account on Kindle Hope Candles, we may request information such as your name, email address, shipping address, phone number, and payment details (such as credit card or debit card information).
privacy_policy_page.p_1_content_2: We may collect data on how you use the website, including your IP address, browser type, access times, and the pages you visited. This information is used to optimize the user experience and improve our services.
privacy_policy_page.p_2_sapo: Your personal information will be used for the following purposes:
privacy_policy_page.p_2_content:
• Order Processing: We use your information to confirm and deliver your order.
  • Improving Services: Data analysis to enhance the shopping experience, develop new products, and improve services.
  • Sending Notifications and Promotions: If you agree, we may send you promotional information, events, or updates from Kindle Hope Candles.
  • Security and Fraud Prevention: Your information will be protected against threats, fraud, or cyber-attacks.
privacy_policy_page.p_3_content: We apply appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. All your payment information will be encrypted during transactions.
privacy_policy_page.p_4_sapo: We are committed to not selling, trading, or renting your personal information to third parties, except in the following cases:
privacy_policy_page.p_4_content:
• Shipping Partners: To complete the delivery, we may share your address with the shipping company.
  • Legal Compliance: We will disclose your information if required by law or by a court order.
  • Service Providers: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist with technology or services for Kindle Hope Candles, but they must also comply with this privacy policy.
privacy_policy_page.p_5_content:
• Access Personal Information: You can request a copy of your personal information.
  • Edit or Delete Information: You can request to edit or delete any inaccurate or unnecessary personal information.
  • Opt-out of Promotional Information: You can unsubscribe from receiving promotional emails from us at any time.
privacy_policy_page.p_6_content: We use cookies to improve the user experience on our website. Cookies are small files stored on your browser that allow us to recognize you when you return to the site. You can disable cookies in your browser, but this may affect the functionality of certain parts of the website.
privacy_policy_page.p_7_content: This privacy policy may be updated at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a notice on the website.
privacy_policy_page.p_8_content: If you have any questions regarding our privacy policy, please contact us via email: support@kindlehopecandles.com.

about_us_page.heading: About Kindle Hope Candles
about_us_page.sapo: Welcome to Kindle Hope Candles, where we believe that each candle not only brings a gentle fragrance but also symbolizes warmth, hope, and kindness. Here, we are not only creating high-quality scented candles but also striving to make a positive difference in the community through charitable activities.
about_us_page.p_1_heading: Our journey began with passion and sharing
about_us_page.p_1_content_1: Kindle Hope Candles was founded by a group of fragrance enthusiasts who wanted to spread love. Starting with simple candles used at home, we gradually expanded our production with the goal of providing delicate and distinctive fragrance experiences for everyone.
about_us_page.p_1_content_2: Each of our candles is made from natural, safe, and eco-friendly materials. Moreover, every detail in the production process is meticulously crafted to ensure the highest quality. However, what sets us apart is not just our scented candles but the mission of Kindle Hope Candles.
about_us_page.p_2_heading: Commitment to the community - Scented candles, big hope
about_us_page.p_2_content_1: For every candle sold, we donate a portion of the revenue to charitable activities. This stems from our desire to create real value for the society and community we live in.
about_us_page.p_2_content_2: We believe that even a small action can lead to significant changes. That's why we chose the name 'Kindle Hope' – to light the flame of hope. By purchasing scented candles from Kindle Hope Candles, you not only bring home a wonderful product but also contribute to supporting those in need and vulnerable communities.
about_us_page.p_3_sapo: Currently, we are collaborating with several charitable organizations and community funds to ensure that the contributions are used effectively and transparently. Some of the projects we have participated in include:
about_us_page.p_3_content:
• Supporting education for underprivileged children: We allocate a portion of our revenue to fund scholarships for students in need. We believe that education is the key to changing lives and bringing about a brighter future.
  • Providing essential supplies to the homeless: In line with our mission of sharing, Kindle Hope Candles also engages in distributing food, warm clothes, and essentials to the homeless, especially during the cold winter months.
  • Environmental protection: In addition to charitable activities, we also donate a portion of our revenue to support environmental protection and recycling projects. We understand that protecting the environment is crucial for the well-being of both present and future generations.
about_us_page.p_4_heading: Our products - the perfect combination of fragrance and soul
about_us_page.p_4_sapo: The scented candles from Kindle Hope Candles are not just decorative items or tools for creating a relaxing atmosphere. Each candle is a work of art, infused with the passion and love of the artisans who make them. We strive to offer a variety of designs and fragrances to suit different preferences and spaces.
about_us_page.p_4_content:
• Natural scented candles: All of our products are made from natural soy wax, free of harmful chemicals, ensuring safety for the user's health.
  • Diverse fragrances: From gentle scents like lavender and vanilla to luxurious ones like sandalwood and cinnamon, we always aim to provide a wide range of choices to meet every customer's needs.
  • Design style: With simple, elegant designs, the candles from Kindle Hope Candles not only fit various interior styles but also make meaningful gifts for loved ones and friends.
about_us_page.p_5_content_1: The vision of Kindle Hope Candles is to become a brand not only known for high-quality scented candles but also recognized as a symbol of sharing and love within the community. We want each customer who thinks of Kindle Hope Candles to feel proud of contributing to a greater cause – helping those less fortunate.
about_us_page.p_5_content_2: Our mission is to continue bringing exceptional, safe, and eco-friendly scented candles to the market. At the same time, Kindle Hope Candles is committed to expanding charitable activities, strengthening community connections, and spreading love through every product.
about_us_page.p_6_content_1: We could not complete this journey without the support and companionship of our customers. Your trust has enabled Kindle Hope Candles to continue growing and extending its positive influence within the community. Every time you light a candle, you not only brighten your space but also kindle hope for those in need.
about_us_page.p_6_content_2: Kindle Hope Candles sincerely thanks all customers, partners, and everyone who has accompanied us throughout this journey. We are committed to continually striving to provide the best products and contribute more to the community.
about_us_page.p_7_content: If you want to learn more about our products or the charitable activities we are involved in, don't hesitate to reach out to Kindle Hope Candles. We are always ready to listen to your feedback and suggestions to improve our services and products every day.

mission_page.heading: Mission & Impact
mission_page.sub_title: Be a part of something great. We are utterly dedicated to giving hope to those in need, create a lasting impact for them.
mission_page.heading_2_1: Donation for the better of our future world
mission_page.sub_heading_1: Kindle Hope Candles is more than a charity, it's a movement dedicated to shaping a brighter future for women, children, and our planet. Through empowering programs, dedicated volunteers, and a global reach, we're fostering positive change and hope in communities worldwide.
mission_page.sub_heading_2_2: Get to know worldwide issues to move you into making a change
mission_page.heading_2_3: Overcoming the issues with our true values
mission_page.issue_1_desc: Our primary mission is to empower women by providing them with access to education, skills, and resources.
mission_page.issue_2_desc: We are dedicated to environmental conservation and earth sustainability both as our ends and also our means.
mission_page.issue_3_desc: We are committed to nurturing the well-being of children by offering quality education, healthcare, and a safe environment.
mission_page.issue_4_desc: We strive to uplift communities by promoting economic development, enhancing access to essential services.
mission_page.sub_heading_2_4: Together, we can empower women, nurture, children's dreams, and preserve our planet.
